trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Milton
There were no other sightings in Milton on or around July 15th 2012
divs: sighting detailsawoke about 2 am 7-15-12, heard a sound like a huge jet engine coming and going over and over, the sound increases like its coming to me and decreases like its moving away? i set my sony cam recorder outside the back door for about 6 minutes, i have heard this before and wasn't able to record it properly, i had my cam recorder at the ready in my office. i havent played the video yet, figure i'd get this posted first. this sound was heard several months ago and was reported to mufon.my wife also heard this sound as it came thur the sheet rock\wall in bedroom, she said she heard it all night and when useing restroom.will submitt sound when i get it on my pc
Summary: jet like noise in the distance, sound increase and decrease
